yuri:GhostForm.NAME: Ghost Form
yuri:GhostForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. NL Reduce your Max HP by 3.
yuri:GhostForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Intangible. NL Reduce your Max HP by 3.

yuri:HeavierStrike.NAME: Heavier Strike
yuri:HeavierStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Insanity affects this card !M! times.
yuri:HeavierStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Insanity affects this card !M! times.

yuri:yuriUncommonSkill.NAME: A better defend
yuri:yuriUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.
yuri:yuriUncommonSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

yuri:ChibiInvasion.NAME: Chibi Invasion
yuri:ChibiInvasion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times. NL Lose !M! Insanity.
yuri:ChibiInvasion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times. NL Lose !M! Insanity.

yuri:ChibiInvasionCorrupt.NAME: CH!vI ?mva@i**n
yuri:ChibiInvasionCorrupt.DESCRIPTION: >Eal !D! #ammge to (AII eneies Y tiNeS. NL Loose !M! Sanity!

yuri:Torment.NAME: Torment
yuri:Torment.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
yuri:Torment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

yuri:yuriRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
yuri:yuriRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

yuri:Oolong.NAME: Oolong Tea
yuri:Oolong.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! hp. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.
yuri:Oolong.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! hp. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

yuri:ThrowingKnives.NAME: Throwing Knives
yuri:ThrowingKnives.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Exhaust.

yuri:WickedSlash.NAME: Wicked Slash
yuri:WickedSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! Insanity.
yuri:WickedSlash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! Insanity.

yuri:DebugCard.NAME: Debug
yuri:DebugCard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust a card in your hand.
yuri:DebugCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust a card in your hand.

yuri:MarkovCurse.NAME: Markov Curse
yuri:MarkovCurse.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, gain 1 Insanity. NL There is no escape from this Curse.

yuri:DeepBreathing.NAME: Deep Breathing
yuri:DeepBreathing.DESCRIPTION: Lose all Insanity. NL Gain it back next turn.

yuri:DeepBreathingCorrupt.NAME: Manic Laughter
yuri:DeepBreathingCorrupt.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Insanity. NL Next turn, lose !M! Insanity.

yuri:GrowingInsanity.NAME: Growing Insanity
yuri:GrowingInsanity.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Insanity.
yuri:GrowingInsanity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Insanity.

yuri:AntiGrowingInsanity.NAME: Anti Growing Insanity
yuri:AntiGrowingInsanity.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, lose 1 Insanity.
yuri:AntiGrowingInsanity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, lose 1 Insanity.

yuri:NerfBat.NAME: Nerf Bat
yuri:NerfBat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy Loses !M! Strength.
yuri:NerfBat.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy Loses !M! Strength.

yuri:Glitch.NAME: Glitch
yuri:Glitch.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Glitched. NL Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust.

yuri:BrokenCode.NAME: Broken Code
yuri:BrokenCode.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Glitched to ALL enemies. NL Shuffle 2 Glitches to your draw pile.
yuri:BrokenCode.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Glitched to ALL enemies. NL Shuffle 2 Glitches to your draw pile.

yuri:NoEscape.NAME: No Escape
yuri:NoEscape.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Double this card's damage for this combat.
yuri:NoEscape.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Double this card's damage for this combat.

yuri:ThornRemove.NAME: Thorn Removal
yuri:ThornRemove.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Remove Thornlike buffs from ALL enemies.
yuri:ThornRemove.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Remove Thornlike buffs from ALL enemies.

yuri:RelentlessStrikes.NAME: Relentless Strikes
yuri:RelentlessStrikes.DESCRIPTION: When playing a card containing the word Strike, draw 1 card.
yuri:RelentlessStrikes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL When playing a card containing the word Strike, draw 1 card.

yuri:DragonForm.NAME: Dragon Form
yuri:DragonForm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Insanity, gain 1 Strength.
yuri:DragonForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Strength. NL Whenever you gain Insanity, gain 1 Strength.

yuri:GlitchedStrike.NAME: Glitched Strike
yuri:GlitchedStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Glitched. NL Shuffle 1 Glitch into your draw pile.
yuri:GlitchedStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Glitched. NL Shuffle 1 Glitch into your draw pile.

yuri:RepairCode.NAME: Repair Code
yuri:RepairCode.DESCRIPTION: Remove Glitched. NL Gain !M! Temporary HP for each Glitched removed.
yuri:RepairCode.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove Glitched. NL Gain !M! Temporary HP for each Glitched removed.

yuri:DejaVu.NAME: Deja Vu
yuri:DejaVu.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Fetch a card from your discard pile.
yuri:DejaVu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Fetch a card from your discard pile.

yuri:RecklessStrike.NAME: Reckless Strike
yuri:RecklessStrike.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 Insanity.
yuri:RecklessStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 1 Insanity.

yuri:UntestedCode.NAME: Untested Code
yuri:UntestedCode.DESCRIPTION: Gain [R]. NL Shuffle 1 Glitch into your draw pile.
yuri:UntestedCode.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [R] [R]. NL Shuffle 1 Glitch into your draw pile.

yuri:ThrowBook.NAME: Throw Book
yuri:ThrowBook.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Exhaust a card in your hand.
yuri:ThrowBook.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Exhaust a card in your hand.

yuri:GlitchRemove.NAME: Glitch Remove
yuri:GlitchRemove.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Exhaust ALL Glitches. NL Gain 3 block whenever you Exhaust a Glitch.
yuri:GlitchRemove.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, Exhaust ALL Status cards. NL Gain 3 block whenever you Exhaust a Status card.

yuri:BookGreen.NAME: Mystery Book
yuri:BookGreen.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, apply 1 Poison.
yuri:BookGreen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever an attack deals unblocked damage, apply 1 Poison. NL At the start of your turn, apply 1 Poison to ALL enemies.

yuri:BookBlue.NAME: Sci-fi Book
yuri:BookBlue.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Orb slots, up to 6. NL Channel 1 Lightning. NL Channel 1 Frost.
yuri:BookBlue.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Focus. NL Gain 2 Orb slots, up to 6. NL Channel 1 Lightning. NL Channel 1 Frost.

yuri:CalmingAura.NAME: Calming Aura
yuri:CalmingAura.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies. NL Lose !M! Insanity.

yuri:CalmingAuraCorrupt.NAME: Dangerous Aura
yuri:CalmingAuraCorrupt.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! Insanity.

yuri:DistillInsanity.NAME: Distill Insanity
yuri:DistillInsanity.DESCRIPTION: Lose all Insanity. NL Gain 1 Strength, Dexterity and Plated Armor for every !M! Insanity lost.

yuri:DistillInsanityCorrupt.NAME: Distill Strength
yuri:DistillInsanityCorrupt.DESCRIPTION: Lose all Strength. NL Gain Insanity equal to your Strength.

yuri:ExploitStrike.NAME: Exploitive Strike
yuri:ExploitStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Double the enemy's Glitched.

yuri:RhapsodyCurse.NAME: Rhapsody Nightmare
yuri:RhapsodyCurse.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, add a random card to your deck. NL Exhaust.
yuri:RhapsodyCurse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, add a random card to your deck. NL Exhaust. NL Hello Rhapsody.

yuri:TripleValue.NAME: Triple Value
yuri:TripleValue.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block twice. NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL Add !M! Shiv to your hand. NL Channel 1 Frost.
yuri:TripleValue.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block twice. NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL Add !M! Shivs to your hand. NL Channel 1 Frost.

yuri:ConsumeGlitch.NAME: Consume Glitch
yuri:ConsumeGlitch.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses all Glitched. NL Raise your Max HP equal to Glitched removed, up to 20. NL Exhaust.
